title: Amazing Specials and Pricing! Renovated Studio with Spacious Kitchen!!
neighborhood: hercules, pinole, san pablo, el sob
posting_body: Be one of the very first to live in this newly renovated luxury studio apartment home!
First Year’s Rent: $1,715 (including $1,200 move-in special with one year lease)
Visit the link below or call us for more details:
Welcome home to the Appian Terrace Apartments!
We offer beautiful 1- and 2-bedroom luxury apartments.
Our homes were designed with you in mind and are equipped with several elegant interior amenities.
Our community is conveniently located in El Sobrante, and within reach of popular retailers, restaurants, and the I-80 freeway.
**ALL APARTMENTS FEATURE BRAND NEW LUXURY RENOVATIONS**
- Stainless-Steel Appliances: Refrigerator, Range, Disposal, Microwave, Built-In Dishwasher
- Coming Soon - Energy Star Qualified & Solar Powered Community
To enhance Social Distancing during this crisis, we encourage you to make an appointment with a member of our team.
For your convenience, many of our communities also provide virtual tours, or can take you on a live video tour through the community.
Please use the link in this ad to visit our website for more information or call/email a member of our leasing team - We're here for you!
We Are a Pet Friendly Community.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
